Name: Rock Star Manager
About the game: MANAGE YOUR OWN MUSIC STUDIO! Congratulations! You're about to buy your own music studio! To strive in the music industry you must: Scout and Hire Bands Train your musicians Schedule gigs and albums Deal with the musicians personal problems Manage your money and reputation ROCK STAR MANAGER FEATURES Scouting and potential system Randomly generated bands and musicians News feed that will keep track of your actions Trait System for the band's frontman Good luck in your journey. I'll surely root for you!
